parties.title: Anna's Birthday
parties.welcomeMessage:
You are invited to celebrate Anna's birthday with an evening of great food, good company, and questionable decisions. We've put together a special menu and some light entertainment.

**Please arrive on time and dress to impress.**

Chef Kacpére will be preparing the food, and the event will be held at the prestigious Le Château de Wandsworth — conveniently located a safe distance from Wandsworth Prison.

**Please bring a bottle of your favourite alcohol for us all to share.**
parties.scheduleNote: Please arrive on time! The evening has been carefully planned and we want to make sure everyone can enjoy the full experience together.

games.name: Hidden Agenda Game
games.description: Each guest will receive a secret identity card with a hidden agenda to complete throughout the evening. Mingle, scheme, and work towards your mysterious goal without being discovered. Will you achieve your objective?

games.name: Secret Hitler
games.description: A social deduction game of political intrigue and betrayal. Players are secretly divided into liberals and fascists. The liberals are trying to pass liberal policies and assassinate Hitler. The fascists are trying to elect Hitler as chancellor and enact fascist policies. Trust no one.

items.name: Pulled Pork Carnitas
items.ingredients: Pork shoulder, orange, lime, garlic, cumin, smoked paprika, chipotle

items.name: Chicken Tinga
items.ingredients: Chicken thighs, tomato, onion, chipotle, garlic, oregano

items.name: Ginger-Lime Paneer
items.ingredients: Paneer, coriander, green chilli, garlic, ginger, lime, yogurt

items.name: Mango Slaw
items.ingredients: Mango, red cabbage, red onion, lime, chilli, honey

items.name: Salsa Roja
items.ingredients: Tomatoes, onion, garlic, chipotle, cumin, smoked paprika, vinegar

items.name: Salsa Verde
items.ingredients: Tomatillos, onion, jalapeños, garlic, coriander, lime

items.name: Chimichurri
items.ingredients: Parsley, coriander, garlic, red chilli, red wine vinegar, olive oil, oregano

recipes.name: Pulled Pork Carnitas
method: Preheat oven to 150°C (or use a slow cooker on LOW).
Season pork chunks with salt and pepper.
In a large ovenproof pot, heat oil and brown pork on all sides. Remove to a plate.
In the same pot, add onions and cook until softened. Add garlic, cumin, smoked paprika, oregano, chipotle paste; cook 1–2 minutes.
Return pork to the pot. Add orange juice, lime juice and stock.
Cover and cook in the oven for 3–4 hours until very tender.
Shred the pork in the cooking juices.
Before serving, spread on a tray and grill briefly to crisp edges.

recipes.name: Chicken Tinga
method: Heat oil and cook sliced onion until soft and browned.
Brown chicken thighs lightly on both sides. Remove to a plate.
Add chopped onion and garlic, cook until softened.
Add chipotle paste, oregano, cumin, smoked paprika; cook 1–2 minutes.
Add tomatoes, vinegar and stock. Simmer 5–10 minutes.
Return chicken to pan, cover and simmer for 25–30 minutes.
Shred chicken and return to sauce. Adjust seasoning.

recipes.name: Ginger-Lime Paneer
method: Blend coriander, green chilli, garlic, ginger, lime juice, yogurt, oil, salt, and honey into a smooth marinade.
Gently toss paneer cubes in the marinade.
Marinate for 30 minutes up to 4 hours.
Preheat oven to 200°C. Line a tray with baking paper.
Spread paneer in a single layer and roast for 15–20 minutes, turning once.
Transfer to serving dish with any remaining marinade.

recipes.name: Mango Slaw
ingredients: 2 ripe mangoes, cut into thin strips
method: Shred cabbage and put in a large bowl.
Add mango, red onion, and chilli.
Mix lime juice, oil, honey, and salt.
Pour dressing over slaw, toss well.
Chill for 30–60 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Salsa Roja
method: Heat oil, add onion and garlic, cook until golden.
Add chipotle paste, cumin, smoked paprika; cook 1–2 minutes.
Add tomatoes and vinegar. Simmer 15–20 minutes.
Blend for smoother salsa or leave chunky.
Season to taste. Serve cold or at room temp.

recipes.name: Salsa Verde
method: Optionally char chillies in a dry pan until blistered.
Blend tomatillos, onion, chillies, garlic, coriander, lime juice and salt.
Adjust salt and lime to taste.
Chill before serving.

recipes.name: Chimichurri
ingredients: 1 large bunch flat-leaf parsley, finely chopped
1 small bunch fresh coriander, finely chopped
½ fresh red chilli, finely chopped
method: Finely chop herbs, garlic and chilli; put in a bowl.
Add vinegar, olive oil, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Stir well. Leave 30–60 minutes to meld flavours.
Stir before serving.
